hero.title: AI-native search understanding for brand visibility
hero.subtitle: Move beyond rankings: map intent, trust signals, and outcomes so AI-first systems surface the right brand experiences.

why.heading: Why AI-SEO is different
points: Answers intent at scale instead of only ranking metrics.
Connects content, signals, and structured context for clearer remediation.

pipeline.heading: How Kasparro works
steps: Input: site crawl, analytics snapshot, search console exports.
ContextPack: entity & intent synthesis from content and metadata.
Audit Modules: parallel modules evaluate signals and rank impact.
Output: prioritized insights, issues, and remediation plan.

platform.title: Platform overview

stages: Modular audits enable independent scoring and prioritized remediation

outputs: Actionable issues with locations and severity

comparison.heading: Compared to traditional SEO tools
points: Kasparro: context-aware, intent-first remediation and auditing across signals.

about.mission: Build tooling that maps search to real business outcomes using modern AI context.
about.philosophy: Make audit outputs actionable: small, prioritized, measurable changes.
about.vision: Search intelligence that treats context as first-class — for brands, not just pages.

architecture.heading: Kasparro architecture
architecture.inputAssembler: Collect crawl, sitemaps, analytics, and product feeds into a normalized dataset.
architecture.contextPack: Synthesize entities, intents and metadata into a lightweight context bundle used by audits.
architecture.modules: Independent audit modules evaluate discrete signals (technical, content, backlinks, CWV, structured, E-E-A-T, non-branded coverage).
architecture.outputs: Prioritized insights, issues with locations, and remediation recommendations with effort and priority metadata.
